attributes.action: never again ask British Troops to go to war, ill equipped and under aged, in support of corrupt pro-western regimes like that of Hamid Karsai and his current Afghan Regimes as has happened traditionally in British and US Foreign Policy over the years and to cease this support now in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as has happened traditionally in British and US Foreign Policy over the years and to cease this support now in Afghanistan
